saltmarsh 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Package index

Processing sequence

The primary sequence of preparing data, building models, and making maps.

These functions normally spawn batch jobs on Unity via slurmcollie (except for screen which is intrinsically interactive), though you can run locally with local = TRUE.

gather()
Collect raster data for each site
screen()
Screen imagery for salt marsh project
derive()
Create derived variables such as NDVI and NDRE
sample()
Sample Y and X variables for a site
fit()
Fit models
map()
Build a geoTIFF map of predictions for specified model fit

Reporting functions

These functions report data and model status

fitinfo()
Give info on models that have been built with fit
assess()
Assess a model
flights_report()
Produce a flights report for one or more sites

Utility functions

Uncommonly-used utility functions

init()
Initialize salt-marsh-mapping with user parameters
build_flights_db()
Read and update or build the flights database for a site
find_orthos()
Find orthophotos for a site

slurmcollie functions

info()
Give info on batch jobs (from slurmcollie)
